WorkItem.Description:
The problem is that if I have Excel file with number formatted using format "##,#0.00" the numbers like 9.7 are converted to format 970 when using PHPExcel_Worksheet::toArray() method.
After some research I found that it's because of my computer's locale settings. The function localeconv() returns thousand separator as empty string, so PHPExcel tries to use "mon_decimal_point" as decimal which is empty.
Maybe should fall-back to the point if no decimal separator found?

I have attached the result of localeconv() from my computer.
WorkItem.Summary: Number format is broken when system's thousands separator is empty
